extendedInfo.description: Daily deals are the best way to get exciting offers for different things, but there are so many India Daily deals websites that it is difficult to keep track of all those. Also there are so many deals on these websites that you can not find the correct deals for you. Pitara solves all your problems by bringing all Indian daily deals at 1 place. Deals are categorized based on there relevance and you can see deals for only those category which you want.Daily deals are more then Spa deals, Pitara Opens a complete different world of daily deals which you would have missed till now.Pitara Features*Get deals from 30 + deals site from India*Get Deals from Sosasta, SnapDeal, Koovs, MyDala, Taggle and many more*Browse Deals based on Categories, see deals only for Electronics or Health & Beauty and many more*Get Deals of 11 Different India Cities like Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Pune, Chennai, amhedabad, Kolkatta, Jaipur, Ahemdabad, Nagpur*Share Deals with you friend on facebook and twitterPitara requires a internet access to get daily deals from pitara servers and uses external storage for caching purpose.KW: Daily Deals,Deals,Indian Deals, Discount deals, Offers, Free, Free Deals, Snapdeal, Crazel, SanpDeal android, snapDeal India, Sosasta, Koovs, Taggle, MyDala, deals  aggregators , aggregators, daily deals india, Indian daily deals, India, deals from india, offer grid, offergrid, daily coupons, coupons, Indian coupons, coupon aggregation,

reviews.title: WTF!!!
reviews.comment: There\'s absolutely nothing in there in this app... How is Google even allowing such apps... Not a single deal for a single city... Please don\'t waste ur time n precious data for this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where is Nagpur?
reviews.comment: In description it is mentioned that nagpur\'s deals are alsp there but it is not even in the city list. Is this a joke?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What it does?
reviews.comment: After installing this app i can not see anything. it is just the city list, the icon and a big blank white screen. no matter what city i select, whatever i search for, it is just a big blank white screen???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No stars!
reviews.comment: Good concept,  but unfortunately developer forgot to mention that it\'s still in testing. I can\'t see any deals for pune,  either it should say deal not available or show them deals if available, it just says \'hurry deal founds\' and shows blank screen. 0 on experience and expectations.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: On the verge of uninstalling
reviews.comment: Has not been useful so far but daily irritating push notifications will make me uninstall it soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on open
reviews.comment: Almost immediately after I open it on the HTC One X I get a message saying \"Unfortunately, Pitara has stopped\"
